name: Cognito
description:
Cognito is a short pixel art adventure game about the struggles of everyday life in a world, where humans dissapeared, and robots live everyday lives stuck in time, no progression, just a single routine, everyday, all day.

You are a person who has to disguise themselves to fit in to the robot lives, just so you can simply survive without harsh discrimination.

You recently noticed an ad for "Grottoroboto", a new bar in town!
In this short little game, you get to experience the day you finally decided to check it out.

Note: The only way to Exit the game is by pressing Alt + F4 or Alt + Tab and closing it through the Windows taskbar.

This game was made @ SSUD Brno - game art
as a Student Project made by one person - Syney
